title: Higher Education Student Data
description: A larger dataset relating to Higher education students.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified via a links towards bottom of page under table column heading "table/chart".  Once relevant table link clicked, a data table is presented on a new page, at the bottom of this table is a link to the actual data in CSV form titled "Download table (csv) | Download source data (csv)".
sizingNotes: As far as I can see only tables of "HE student enrolments by personal characteristics 2013/14 - 2017/18" and when "next" clicked to reveal further tables, "UK domiciled student enrolments by disability and sex 2014/15 to 2017/18 " have disability data. Simple table structures and dimensions. CSV format downloadable.
notes:
Open Data source available, so this is potentially an easy win dataset.
May fit better with an "Education" family
